author: kmalhi
msg: Running the command "openejb stop --help" throws a null pointer exception
The previous patch did not check-in stop.help for some reason. Created stop.help

author: jonesde
msg: Small change so that if not specified needsInventoryReceive will default to null; it's really nasty when a return is suddenly complete when you only intended to mark it as accepted, in fact so bad that it's tempting to make this feature a little tough to access to avoid accidentally handing out money and such

author: faridz
msg: * runall.cpp (main): Added ability to pass list of the targets
* cmdopt.cpp: Updated usage_text with description of the
* runall.wsf (runAllExamples): Pass targets using text file
rather than using command line if the resulting command line
length would exceed the maximum value.

author: gsim
msg: Use frameset begin/end flags for determining frameset boundaries.
Set frameset & segment begin/end flags for content bearing methods (i.e. messages).

author: pauls
msg: Enable support for exporting the same package more then once (FELIX-101).
